alert.note: Alert for Southern Columbia; Suwannee (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 12 at 8:11PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Columbia and east central Suwannee Counties through 845 PM EDT... At 811 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a landspout around 3 miles southeast of Mcalpin, or 12 miles northwest of Ichetucknee Spring, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts and wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lake City, Columbia and Watertown. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
